root.name: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion R2 Banjou no Geass Gekijou
root.description: Based on the Code Geass, a wartime-drama anime series, that was created by Goro Taniguchi and Ichirou Ohkouchi. Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion R2 Banjou no Geass Gekijou (コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュR2 盤上のギアス劇場, Kōde Giasu: Hangyaku no Ruruushu R2 Banjou no Giasu Gekijou) is a mini game collection that stars many of the characters from the second Code Geass anime season. It was published by BanDai. It was released in Japan on August 7, 2008. To date, no US release date has been announced. The characters are illustrated in a deformed state often referred to as chibi style. Each charter is based upon a separate themed mini game. They include card games, boards games, including side scrolling platformers and beat-em' ups, and other assorted games. The original cast from the Japanese anime voice the characters through the game.
